GSILabs.BModel

Interface Performer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Artist, Collective

    public interface Performer
    A performer is any kind of person or group of person in charge of an event for which a ticket can be purchased.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of the performer.
      java.lang.String getWorkDescription()
      Retrieves a textual representation of the work by the performer.
      void setWorkDescription(java.lang.String description)
      Overwrites the description for the given performer.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Return the name of the performer. It must be unique, meaning that different Performer cannot have a repeated name. This holds regardless of the type (class) of performer they are
        Returns:
        the artistic name of the performer

      • getWorkDescription

        java.lang.String getWorkDescription()
        Retrieves a textual representation of the work by the performer.
        Returns:
        Description of the work of the performer

      • setWorkDescription

        void setWorkDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Overwrites the description for the given performer. This is done regardless of the description that was previously associated with the performer (if any).
        Parameters:
        description - New description for the work of the performer
